paper_abstract: Unit time-phase signal sets have many important applications in radar or sonar systems. Upper bounds or lower bounds on the maximum cross ambiguity amplitudes of unit time-phase signal sets with have been presented in the literature. In this paper, we use Gauss sums to determine the explicit maximum cross ambiguity amplitudes of some infinite series of unit time-phase signal sets which were constructed by Ding et al. (Cryptogr Commun 5:209-227, 2013).
paper_title: Unit time-phase signal sets with the explicit maximum cross ambiguity amplitudes
